Text: Thank You Cc Greg Thank you for referring me to John Lavorato who in turn referred me to Dave Duran and Chis Calger of East and West Power Originaton respectively I am speaking with Ben Jacoby who works with Dave Duran and I am optimistic of a potential match between Enrons needs and my career goals Best regards Manuel

Request for Meeting Cc Greg I just spoke with Liz regarding my request for a brief meeting with you this week In light of Enrons overall thrust to focus on merchant oriented activities and to diminish exposure on assets in emerging market my boss Chris Hunt suggested that I meet with you among other individuals to seek advice on alternative career options at Enron Although I am open to areas in which I would be most useful to the company I do have a particular interest in getting involved in wholesale electricity markets I hope you will have the time to meet briefly For your convenience attached below is my resume Best regards Manuel
